item.title: Apache FOP Test fix
item.description:
Test fix by GA :
Fix errors and warnings in example files. Add build.xml for documentation examples.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 53458)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 53458)
:
Fix incorrect language and country code key generation in hyphenation tree cache. Thanks to Dieter von Holten.

item.title: Apache FOP Images fix (bug 53431)
item.description:
Images fix by GA (fixes bug 53431)
:
Fix incorrect SVG line dash pattern with PDF output format. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Images update (bug 40676)
item.description:
Images update by GA (fixes bug 40676)
:
Fix interoperability issue with Adobe reader regarding use of multiple filters. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by GA :
Eliminate javadocs warnings.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 52338)
item.description:
Renderers add by VH (fixes bug 52338)
:
Added possibility to embed TrueType fonts in PostScript.

item.title: Apache FOP Images update (bug 40676)
item.description:
Images update by GA (fixes bug 40676)
:
Update site documentation about PNG image loading configuration and support. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Images update (bug 40676)
item.description:
Images update by GA (fixes bug 40676)
:
Fix newly introduced findbugs warnings. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Images fix (bug 40676)
item.description:
Images fix by GA (fixes bug 40676)
:
Support use of ImageLoaderRawPNG decoder in order to prevent re-encoding of PNG images (and unnecssary output file bloat). Thanks to Luis Bernardo, Matthias Reischenbacher.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 53412)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 53412)
:
Eliminate incorrect use of object identity which produces excessive property cache collisions. Thanks to Alexios Giotis.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by GA :
Eliminate javadocs warnings.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update (bug 53055)
item.description:
Code update by GA (fixes bug 53055)
:
Update xmlgraphics common jar to reflect recent fixes in XGC.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update (bug 43940)
item.description:
Code update by GA (fixes bug 43940)
:
Fix handling of NaN, {+,-}Infinity, and other edge cases. Submitted by Julien Aymé. Thanks to Julien Aymé.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 53304,53306)
item.description:
Renderers fix by GA (fixes bug 53304,53306)
:
Add version attribute to AT and IF intermediate formats. Also eliminate redundant use of reversed attribute in AT format.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 53295)
item.description:
Renderers fix by GA (fixes bug 53295)
:
Add extension to place code just before PostScript %PageTrailer. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 53294)
item.description:
Renderers fix by GA (fixes bug 53294)
:
Fix invalid PostScript file being created when font-size is 0. Thanks to Robert Meyer.

item.title: Apache FOP Docs update
item.description:
Docs update by GA :
Update FAQ and New Bug documentation.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by VH :
Added support for the role property on fo:page-sequence, fo:flow and fo:static-content. This allows to change the mapping of those FOs to PDF structure types when enabling accessibility.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by VH :
Stop outputting the Type entry for structure elements in order to create a smaller PDF ouptut when accessibility is enabled. Thanks to Martin Koegler.

item.title: Apache FOP Config fix (bug 52144)
item.description:
Config fix by GA (fixes bug 52144)
:
Fix crash on use of version switch (-v). Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 53242)
item.description:
Renderers fix by GA (fixes bug 53242)
:
Support fractional line widths in AFP renderer, fixing problem with SVG line drawing. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Config fix (bug 53248)
item.description:
Config fix by GA (fixes bug 53248)
:
Fix exception thrown from use of -print option in CLI. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Docs fix (bug 53247)
item.description:
Docs fix by GA (fixes bug 53247)
:
Fix renderer mime type for PCL output; should be application/x-pcl.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 40699)
item.description:
Renderers fix by GA (fixes bug 40699)
:
Fix for invalid PDF for certain numerical values in SVG lineargradient. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 53185)
item.description:
Layout fix by GA (fixes bug 53185)
:
Unify date formatting between FOP and XGC as well as tidying the date format code. Thanks to Robert Meyer.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 45715)
item.description:
Layout fix by GA (fixes bug 45715)
:
Fix for break before (break-before) not respected on blocks nested in inlines. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 48723)
item.description:
Renderers fix by GA (fixes bug 48723)
:
Fix for XGC when rendering PostScript using SVG being drawn upside down when using a custom affine transform. Thanks to Robert Meyer.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 43940)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 43940)
:
Use new double format utility to improve thread safety and performance. Thanks to Ognjen Blagojevic.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 53148)
item.description:
Fonts fix by GA (fixes bug 53148)
:
Fix performance regression in JDK 1.6 Update 19 due to use of Java Beans API. Fix checkstyle errors. Thanks to Tassos Charoulis.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 51484)
item.description:
Renderers fix by GA (fixes bug 51484)
:
Don't write final /sect suffix in RTF if section is last section. Thanks to Benjamin Riefenstahl.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 53143)
item.description:
Fonts fix by GA (fixes bug 53143)
:
Ensure fonts are not loaded twice (redundantly).

item.title: Apache FOP Test update (bug 50196)
item.description:
Test update by GA (fixes bug 50196)
:
Add test for basic-link with padding. Thanks to Matthias Reischenbacher.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update
item.description:
Code update by GA :
Improve property function argument parsing, specifically, better separate required, optional, and variable arguments and the handling of optional argument defaults. Regularize property function class names.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 51043)
item.description:
Layout fix by GA (fixes bug 51043)
:
Don't restart layout unless abs(ipd difference) > 1 in order to prevent rounding issues from triggering false restart. Thanks to Pascal Sancho.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts update
item.description:
Fonts update by GA :
Removing experimental feature that violates XSL-FO and Unicode semantics by misinterpreting Basic Latin code points. Users must use private use codepoints to access font specific character mappings that have no assigned Unicode code point. See bug 50492.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 53103)
item.description:
Layout fix by GA (fixes bug 53103)
:
Ensure that table cell spanning works in right-to-left writing mode. Thanks to Matthias Reischenbacher.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 53086)
item.description:
Layout fix by GA (fixes bug 53086)
:
Ensure that table footer and header are included in bididirectional resolution.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 53097)
item.description:
Layout fix by GA (fixes bug 53097)
:
Ensure writing-mode specified on fo:table is used to determine writing mode of table and its descendants.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 53094)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 53094)
:
Convert block container overflow exception to event model, improving overflow property behavior. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update (bug 51617)
item.description:
Code update by GA (fixes bug 51617)
:
Add run target for embedded examples. Add increased JVM memory heap flag for example8 in case font cache is rebuilt.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 53083)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 53083)
:
Update to use of checkstyle-5.5 as default configuration. Remove checkstyle-4.0 configuration. Also, import environment build properties before local properties, so that latter can refer to former.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 52572)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 52572)
:
Prevent NPE on use of unsupported collapse-with-precedence; fall back to collapse. Fix checkstyle errors from prior commit. Thanks to Pascal Sancho.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 52514)
item.description:
Layout fix by GA (fixes bug 52514)
:
Ensure square image is appropriately scaled. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 50062)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 50062)
:
Invoke JVM in headless mode from FOP command scripts and JS shell to prevent stealing focus from GUI applications.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 52114)
item.description:
Renderers fix by GA (fixes bug 52114)
:
Take leading derived space before/after into account when computing rows for TXT renderer.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 49893)
item.description:
Code add by PH (fixes bug 49893)
:
A global setting to wrap F11 images in page segments.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 52763)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 52763)
:
Support list-block in marker, thus preventing NPE.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by GA :
Must use unqualified (local name) when reporting invalid child error.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 53065)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 53065)
:
Restore lookup on Event message lookup field part. Add locale field to Event to enable locale dependent deferred bundle load during lookup field part substitution.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by MH :
Bug in AFP font metrics that performed integer arithmetic when it should have been double arithemetic.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 49754)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 49754)
:
Bring clone() in line with the recommendations in Object.clone(). Thanks to Simon Pepping.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 52966)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 52966)
:
How to use native text with EPSDocumentGraphics2D. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 51599)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 51599)
:
Allow https scheme URI for PDF external action target. Thanks to Paul Huemer.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 50901)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 50901)
:
RTF percentage table column width not calculated from table. Thanks to Carsten Pfeiffer.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 51009)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 51009)
:
RTF generates unexpected lines for blocks in tables. Also fix three findbugs issues. Thanks to Max Aster.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 51007)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 51007)
:
RTF tables do not support percent column-widths. Thanks to Max Aster.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 50435)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 50435)
:
Access denied (java.util.PropertyPermission org.apache.fop.fo.properties.use-cache read). Thanks to Armin Haaf.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 49763)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 49763)
:
Incorrect message when encountering a block in an inline in a footnote. Thanks to Adrian Buza.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 47380)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 47380)
:
Specified rule-thickness applies only when leader-pattern is rule, otherwise should use default thickness. Thanks to Georg Datterl.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 49302)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 49302)
:
Eliminate duplicate code. Thanks to Julien Aymé.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 49350)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 49350)
:
Correct coding error in AFPResourceLevel#equals. Thanks to Julien Aymé.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 51836)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 51836)
:
Throw IFException instead of NPE if navigation target (page reference) doesn't exist. Thanks to Melanie Drake.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 51808)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 51808)
:
Fixed memory waste in traits map. Thanks to Sergey Vladimirov.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 51807)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 51807)
:
Fixed small memory waste in rowCells array construction. Thanks to Sergey Vladimirov.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 53005)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 53005)
:
Fixed incorrect rejection of fo:wrapper inside fo:inline inside fo:footnote-body. Thanks to Alberto Simões.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by VH :
Added support for PDF Object Streams. When accessibility is enabled and PDF version 1.5 selected, the structure tree will be stored in object streams in order to reduce the size of the final PDF. Thanks to Peter Hancock.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 46962)
item.description:
Code fix by VH (fixes bug 46962)
:
Fixed deadlock in PropertyCache. Thanks to Alexios Giotis.

item.title: Apache FOP Config add (bug 51385)
item.description:
Config add by VH (fixes bug 51385)
:
Added configuration option to set the version of the output PDF document. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 52849)
item.description:
Code fix by MH (fixes bug 52849)
:
Fixed bug that caused a configured and installed SVG font to be stroked, also added an event indicating when fonts are stroked. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by PH :
Fix of a bug introduced when merging ImproveAccessibility.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 50391)
item.description:
Code add by PH (fixes bug 50391)
:
Improved support for empty flow-name mapping.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout add (bug 32789, 49008, 49687)
item.description:
Layout add by GA (fixes bug 32789, 49008, 49687)
:
Add support for complex scripts, including: full bidi support, support for advanced typographic tables, advanced support for number conversion.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts add
item.description:
Fonts add by GA :
Add support for OpenType advanced typographic tables (GDEF, GSUB, GPOS).

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 52655)
item.description:
Code fix by VH (fixes bug 52655)
:
Fixed rendering of special glyphs when using single-byte encoding mode. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by PH :
Improvements of the Accessibility features. Thanks to Vincent Hennebert.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 52416)
item.description:
Code add by CB (fixes bug 52416)
:
Suppress unnecessary "font not found warnings" when generating AFP with raster fonts Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 51209)
item.description:
Code add by CB (fixes bug 51209)
:
SVG text in AFP creates miscoded GOCA text Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 50391)
item.description:
Code add by CB (fixes bug 50391)
:
Add support for different flow-name of fo:region-body in FOP Thanks to Peter Hancock.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 51664)
item.description:
Code add by CB (fixes bug 51664)
:
Tagged PDF performance improvement plus tests Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 52197)
item.description:
Code add by MH (fixes bug 52197)
:
Improved AdobeStandardEncoding support in AFM files for type1 fonts

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 52151)
item.description:
Code add by VH (fixes bug 52151)
:
Added ant script to get JaCoCo code coverage. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 52136)
item.description:
Code add by VH (fixes bug 52136)
:
Added to build file JUnit target that uses a regex to run all of the test cases. This reduces the risk that some of them are omitted when building FOP. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 52089)
item.description:
Code add by PH (fixes bug 52089)
:
Allow JPEG images to be embedded in an AFP document as is, without being decoded and encoded. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 52010)
item.description:
Code add by PH (fixes bug 52010)
:
Simplification of the build: Reduced code duplication and layout engine tests. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
Various bugfixes to make PDFDocumentGraphics2D operational again.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 51962)
item.description:
Code add by PH (fixes bug 51962)
:
Fix for when the last simple-page-master referenced in a page-sequence-master is not chosen when force-page-count=odd. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 51928)
item.description:
Code add by VH (fixes bug 51928)
:
Upgraded all tests to JUnit 4. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 48696)
item.description:
Fonts fix by PH (fixes bug 48696)
:
Bugfix for color model in IOCA IDE structure parameter for 4- and 8-bit grayscale images. Revision 4.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 51760)
item.description:
Fonts fix by PH (fixes bug 51760)
:
Changes the way PostScript handles Graphics2D images such that if the language is set to level 3, the image is stored as an embedded file which has no length limit. Previously it was stored as an array which has a implementation limit of 65535 elements. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 51759)
item.description:
Fonts fix by PH (fixes bug 51759)
:
PDFFactory responsible for asdigning name to a subset font. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 51530)
item.description:
Fonts fix by PH (fixes bug 51530)
:
Improved support for EBCDIC encoded double byte fonts fo AFP. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 51205)
item.description:
Fonts fix by PH (fixes bug 51205)
:
Corrected typographical errors in AFPBase12FontCollection. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 48062)
item.description:
Renderers fix by PH (fixes bug 48062)
:
Improved fix of a bug relating to PCL painter thread safetly. Previous fix in rev 895012 worked by synchronizing methods of a static instance of Java2DFontMetrics. This fix uses a unique instance for per thread.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by PH :
Fixed a bug in AFP where an ArrayOutofBoundsException is throwqn when embedding a Page Segment.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by VH :
Added support for 128bit encryption in PDF output. Thanks to Michael Rubin.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by PH :
Fixed a bug in AFP where the object area axes of an Include Object was incorrectly set when rotated by 180.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 51596)
item.description:
Fonts fix by JM (fixes bug 51596)
:
Fixed a bug in TTF subsetting where a composite glyph could get remapped more than once resulting in garbled character. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 50605)
item.description:
Fonts fix by JM (fixes bug 50605)
:
Fixed a number of bugs concerning Type 1 and other single-byte fonts (glyph width mismatches and overlapping characters).

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
Fixed a multi-threading bug for SVG images included through svg:image inside SVG documents.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by PH :
Added an IFDocumentHandler filter for triggering rendering events. Created an Event that captures an end page event with the page number.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by VH :
Fix for alternative text not working in tagged PDF for TIFF images.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 50909)
item.description:
Renderers fix by PH (fixes bug 50909)
:
Fixed io exception in MODCAParser caused by the improper use of mark() and reset() on the MODCA data input stream. Added unit test.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 51144)
item.description:
Fonts fix by JM (fixes bug 51144)
:
Removed invalid entries in ToUnicode table of CID subset fonts. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 50899)
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM (fixes bug 50899)
:
Fixed mapping of font weights between CSS values and TextAttribute.WEIGHT_*. Thanks to Glenn Adams.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
AFP GOCA: fonts were not embedded from within AFPGraphics2D.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
AFP GOCA: Changed the way FOP fonts are selected based on Batik's GVT fonts to match the behaviour of PDF/PS output.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
Added option to place AFP NOPs right before the end of a named page group (page-sequence), rather than after the start.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
Added option for PostScript output to optimize for file size rather than quality.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
AFP GOCA: Added option to disable GOCA and to control text painting inside GOCA graphics.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
AFP GOCA: Work-around for InfoPrint's AFP implementation which seems to lose the character set state over Graphics Data (GAD) boundaries.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
Bugfix for AFP GOCA segments: they were not properly marked as appended which could lead to graphics state changes in some implementations.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 51010)
item.description:
Renderers fix by CB (fixes bug 51010)
:
Bugzilla 51010: Bookmarks create useless lines in RTF Thanks to Max Aster.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 51008)
item.description:
Renderers fix by CB (fixes bug 51008)
:
Bugzilla 51008: page-number-citation-last does not work in RTF Thanks to Max Aster.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by VH :
Added id element to intermediate format to track the origin of content.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 50987)
item.description:
Renderers fix by AD (fixes bug 50987)
:
Bugzilla 50988: Fixed a NullPointerException in case a white-space fo:character was removed due to white-space handling. Thanks to Matthias Reischenbacher.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 50987)
item.description:
Renderers fix by AD (fixes bug 50987)
:
Bugzilla 50987: Fixed an issue in PDF output where a link was added to the parent tree instead of the related structure element. Thanks to Martin Koegler.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 50986)
item.description:
Renderers fix by AD (fixes bug 50986)
:
Bugzilla 50986: Fixed an issue where invalid PDF page content was generated due to incorrect ET/EMC sequences. Thanks to Martin Koegler.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 50593)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 50593)
:
Fixed regression introduced by Bugzilla 50593: bookmarks pointing to a non-existing internal destination should just trigger a warning.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 50965)
item.description:
Layout fix by AD (fixes bug 50965)
:
Bugzilla 50965: Fixed a regression in BlockContainerLayoutManager where margins were no longer reset after forced breaks. Thanks to Martin Koegler.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix
item.description:
Layout fix by VH :
Implemented non-standard behavior for basic-link areas, such that they take into account the heights of their descendants areas.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix
item.description:
Layout fix by VH :
Fix for keep-together does not apply to fo:table-cell.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix
item.description:
Layout fix by VH :
Fix for keep-together on a table containing row-spanning cells that was not honored.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 50196)
item.description:
Layout fix by VH (fixes bug 50196)
:
Fix forpadding-start ignored when table-header/footer is repeated. Thanks to Matthias Reischenbacher.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
Increased maximum possible PDF size from 2GB to around 9GB (hard maximum imposed by the PDF specification).

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
Added support for CIE Lab colors (from XSL-FO 2.0 WD).

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 49403)
item.description:
Renderers add by JM (fixes bug 49403)
:
Initial work on spot colors (aka named colors) for PDF output. Thanks to Patrick Jaromin.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 50705)
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM (fixes bug 50705)
:
Fix to preserve the order of AFP TLEs and NOPs as given in the XSL-FO document. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts add (bug 50699)
item.description:
Fonts add by JM (fixes bug 50699)
:
Added support for lookup of alternative glyphs when additional single-byte encodings are used, ex. replacing "Omegagreek" by "Omega" and vice versa. Thanks to Alexandros Papadakis.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 48334)
item.description:
Code add by AD (fixes bug 48334)
:
Added support for resolution of relative URIs against a specified xml:base during property refinement.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
Allow afp:no-operation to also appear under fo:page-sequence and fo:declarations.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 50635)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 50635)
:
Fix for issue in RenderPagesModel.checkPreparedPages() where the same page-sequence is potentially started multiple times. Thanks to Martin Koegler.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 50636)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 50636)
:
Fix for performance issue when adding pages, if the total number of pages is significantly large. Thanks to Martin Koegler.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 50626)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 50626)
:
Fix for performance issue when adding nodes, if the number of children is significantly large. Thanks to Martin Koegler.

item.title: Apache FOP Config fix
item.description:
Config fix by SP :
Fix for relative URIs in the configuration file (base, font-base, hyphenation-base) are evaluated relative to the base URI of the configuration file.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 49848)
item.description:
Layout fix by AD (fixes bug 49848)
:
Fix for correct behavior of keep-together.within-line in case there are nested inlines

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 50471)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 50471)
:
Fix for avoid ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException for codepoints without a linebreak class

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 48380)
item.description:
Layout fix by AD (fixes bug 48380)
:
Fix for avoid ClassCastException when using fox:widow-content-limit

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 50089)
item.description:
Layout fix by VH (fixes bug 50089)
:
Fix for content after forced break in block-container is not rendered.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 42034)
item.description:
Layout fix by JM (fixes bug 42034)
:
Fixed adjustment of inline parent area for justified text containing a forward page reference.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 38264)
item.description:
Layout fix by AD (fixes bug 38264)
:
Fixed behavior when combining hyphenation with preserved linefeeds or whitespace.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 49695)
item.description:
Code fix by VH (fixes bug 49695)
:
Replaced magic numbers with constants from UnitConv and GraphicsConstants. Thanks to Joshua Marquart.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 42600)
item.description:
Renderers add by JM (fixes bug 42600)
:
Added some support for break-before/-after for RTF output. Thanks to Max Aster.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 49379)
item.description:
Renderers add by JM (fixes bug 49379)
:
Added ability to embed an external AFP page segment resource file (AFP output only). Thanks to Peter Hancock.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 46360)
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM (fixes bug 46360)
:
Fixed a multi-threading issue when rendering SVG. Thanks to Alexios Giotis.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 49885)
item.description:
Layout fix by JM (fixes bug 49885)
:
Fixed retrieval of available BPD for cases spanning columns and multiple pages with differing page masters.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers remove
item.description:
Renderers remove by VH :
Removed old Renderer implementations for those output formats that have a version based on the new DocumentHandler architecture available (AFP, PCL, PDF, PS).

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix
item.description:
Fonts fix by AC :
Reinstated support for being able to specify a font cache filepath in the fop user configuration.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts add
item.description:
Fonts add by AC :
Added convenience support for the flushing of the Fop font cache file from the command line.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 44460)
item.description:
Renderers add by JM (fixes bug 44460)
:
Added support for PDF File Attachments (Embedded Files). Thanks to Andrejus Chaliapinas.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
AFP Output: Fixed positioning of Java2D-based images (when GOCA is enabled).

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
AFP Output: Added enhanced dithering functionality for images that are converted to bi-level images.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
AFP Output: Fix for bitmap images inside an SVG or G2D graphic (printer errors) and positioning fix for bitmaps from G2D graphics.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 42306)
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM (fixes bug 42306)
:
Fix for AWT viewer to correctly track page numbers in continuous display mode. Thanks to Richard Wheeldon.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
Bugfix for formatting of floating point numbers which could lead to invalid PDFs.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
Added a save/restoreGraphicsState pair for the initial coordinate system in PDF output for easier post-processing.

item.title: Apache FOP Images add
item.description:
Images add by JM :
Added customization ability for the image loading framework from FOP's configuration file.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 48696)
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM (fixes bug 48696)
:
Bugfix for color model in IOCA IDE structure parameter for 4- and 8-bit grayscale images. Thanks to Peter Hancock.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 48567)
item.description:
Renderers add by JM (fixes bug 48567)
:
Initial support for CID-keyed double-byte fonts (Type 0) in AFP output. Thanks to Peter Hancock.

item.title: Apache FOP API add
item.description: API add by SP : Added a command-line option '-catalog' to use a catalog resolver for the XML and XSLT files

item.title: Apache FOP Layout add
item.description: Layout add by SP : Implement internal character classes if the hyphenation pattern file does not contain them

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 46486)
item.description:
Layout fix by VH (fixes bug 46486)
:
Bugfix: having a special page-master for the last page caused loss of content when normal blocks were mixed with blocks spanning all columns.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by VH :
Added possibility to customize PDF tagging via the ‘role’ property.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 48237)
item.description:
Renderers fix by CB (fixes bug 48237)
:
Bugfix: AFP Renderer: Respect image color settings for svg Thanks to Peter Hancock.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 48376)
item.description:
Renderers fix by CB (fixes bug 48376)
:
Bugfix: AFP Renderer: Page Overlays not generated when using Intermediate Format Thanks to Venkat Reddy.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 48456)
item.description:
Renderers fix by CB (fixes bug 48456)
:
Bugfix: AFP Renderer: Underline is incorrectly placed when reference-orientation != 0

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 48453)
item.description:
Renderers fix by CB (fixes bug 48453)
:
Bugfix: AFP Renderer: Page Segments not positioned correctly when reference-orientation != 0

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts add
item.description:
Fonts add by JM :
Added support for TrueType fonts with symbol character maps (like "Wingdings" and "Symbol"). Character for these fonts are usually found in the 0xF020 to 0xF0FF range (a Unicode private use area).

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix
item.description:
Fonts fix by JM :
Bugfix: Font selection fallbacks did not work in some cases (ex. bold+italic to normal)

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 48290)
item.description:
Renderers fix by CB (fixes bug 48290)
:
Bugfix: AFP Renderer: AttributeQualifier Triplet occurs before TLE Value.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 48048)
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM (fixes bug 48048)
:
Bugfix in AFP output: fixed flags in GOCA GBAR order. Thanks to D.W. Harks.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 48185)
item.description:
Renderers fix by VH (fixes bug 48185)
:
Bugfix in AFP output: rounding error when computing the CMYK components of a color. Thanks to Harald G. Henne.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 48167)
item.description:
Code fix by VH (fixes bug 48167)
:
Bugfix: when #CMYK pseudo-profile was used in the rgb-icc() function, always the fallback RGB colors were used instead. Thanks to Venkat Reddy.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 48082)
item.description:
Layout fix by VH (fixes bug 48082)
:
Bugfix: value of conditional space not always taken into account in the calculation of a table’s height.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 46705)
item.description:
Renderers add by JM,VH (fixes bug 46705)
:
Added basic accessibility and Tagged PDF support. Thanks to Jost Klopfstein.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
Added support for encoding CMYK bitmap images (IOCA FS45) and TIFF images as embedded objects.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by AC :
Added support for xmlfile and xsltfile parameters in FOP's Ant Task.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 47941)
item.description:
Renderers fix by AC (fixes bug 47941)
:
BugFix: Maintain valid AFP by providing TLE truncation on Attribute Value Triplet values that are greater than 250 chars in length.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 47711)
item.description:
Fonts fix by JM (fixes bug 47711)
:
Fixed generation of CIDSet object in PDF output. Thanks to Nicolas Peninguy.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix
item.description:
Layout fix by VH :
Fixed handling of percentage values for provisional-label-separation.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 47835)
item.description:
Layout fix by VH (fixes bug 47835)
:
Fixed handling of percentage values for provisional-distance-between-starts. Thanks to Jonathan Levinson.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by CB :
Added support for positioning Page Overlays in AFP Output

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts add
item.description:
Fonts add by JM :
Added support for specifying referenced fonts per renderer in addition to the general match list.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
Added support for creating thumbnails or preview bitmaps of fixed size for PNG and TIFF output.

item.title: Apache FOP Extensions add
item.description:
Extensions add by JM :
Added support for the #CMYK pseudo-profile supported by some commercial XSL implementations on the rgb-icc() function.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout add
item.description:
Layout add by VH :
Added limited support for pages of different inline-progression-dimensions within a page-sequence.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout add (bug 46905)
item.description:
Layout add by AD (fixes bug 46905)
:
Added basic implementation for column-keeps.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 47710)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 47710)
:
White-space handling in markers with inline-content throws a NullPointerException in some cases.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 47694)
item.description:
Renderers fix by CB (fixes bug 47694)
:
Dithered Background Shading can produce illegal AFP if objects are very small

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by CB :
AFP Output: Added support for IMM Extension on fo:simple-page-master.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 47311)
item.description:
Renderers add by JM (fixes bug 47311)
:
Added an initial set of extensions for prepress support (fox:bleed, fox:crop-offset, fox:crop-box and fox:scale). This is currently supported only by PDF and Java2D renderers. Thanks to Peter Coppens.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
PCL Output: Added support for specifying the output bin.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
AFP Output: Added support for embedding external AFP form maps (form defs) using the afp:include-form-map extension.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
AFP Output: Added support for AFP font embedding. Note: this changes the default behaviour. Like with PDF and PS, all fonts are embedded by default unless matched in the "referenced-fonts" section in the configuration.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 47508)
item.description:
Renderers fix by AD (fixes bug 47508)
:
Bugfix: Error while writing TLE's attribute qualifier in the output. Thanks to Bharat Attaluri.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by CB :
Bugfix: support justified text in AFP Renderer (already working in AFP Painter)

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by AD :
AFP Renderer Raster Fonts:
added support for fractional font-sizes in the configuration. selection of the smaller font-size, in case two possible fallbacks have the same difference to a requested size.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix
item.description:
Fonts fix by CB :
Bugfix: support PFM Files with no extent table.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 46960)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 46960)
:
Bugfix: previously retrieved markers were not cleared if the new marker was empty.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 47232)
item.description:
Fonts fix by VH (fixes bug 47232)
:
Bugfix: for the last character of a Type1 font, always a width of 0 was returned. Thanks to Maxim Wirt.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by VH :
Changed meaning of ‘-v’ option to ‘verbose’, which will print FOP’s version and proceed. Added a ‘-version’ option to simply print the version then exit, following Java practices.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 47101)
item.description:
Layout fix by VH (fixes bug 47101)
:
Bugfix: The cells of a table inside a marker were duplicated at every marker retrieval.

item.title: Apache FOP Images fix
item.description:
Images fix by JM :
Bugfix: use the effective color profile supplied by the ImageEncodingHelper, instead of the original one.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
Bugfix: reset graphic state when a page is finished in PostScript.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
Added setting to enable dithered painting of filled rectangles in AFP and PCL.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix
item.description:
Layout fix by VH :
Bugfix: footnotes occurring within the forced height of a table row did not appear on the output

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers update (bug 47031)
item.description:
Renderers update by JM (fixes bug 47031)
:
PDFGraphics2D.writeClip doesn't generate a clip command anymore when the clip path is empty. Thanks to Francois Fernandes.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 47000)
item.description:
Renderers add by JM (fixes bug 47000)
:
Added a custom text painter for rendering SVG text using text operators when rendering to PostScript or EPS. Text is no longer painted as shapes, thus creating much smaller files.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
Fixed a bug that left the PrintRenderer unconfigured even if a configuration was specified for "application/X-fop-print".

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 46882)
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM (fixes bug 46882)
:
Fixed the handling of CMYK colors in PDFGraphics2D. Thanks to Yegor Kozlov.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 46489)
item.description:
Layout fix by AD (fixes bug 46489)
:
Fixed a bug when combining a forced break with a "last" page-master. The restart of the algorithm would start at the index of the penalty corresponding to the last page-break. This has been changed to the index of the first element after the last page-break.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts add
item.description:
Fonts add by JM :
Added a command-line tool to list all configured fonts (org.apache.fop.tools.fontlist.FontListMain).

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 46828)
item.description:
Code add by AD (fixes bug 46828)
:
Added the possibility to use CachedRenderPagesModel, to conserve memory in case of large documents with a lot of cross-references (area tree will be serialized to disk to avoid keeping it entirely in memory). Thanks to Dario Laera.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts add
item.description:
Fonts add by JM :
AFP Fonts: Added support for full URI resolution on configured AFP fonts.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
AFP Output: Tag Logical Element (TLE) is now also allowed on fo:page-sequence (page group level).

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix
item.description:
Layout fix by JM :
Fixed BPD trait and border painting for leaders with leader-pattern="space" (and similar cases).

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
AFP Output: Added support for Invoke Medium Map (IMM).

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
Introduced a new, additional intermediate format optimized for performance. Please see the intermediate format documentation for details.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 46686)
item.description:
Fonts fix by JM (fixes bug 46686)
:
Use temporary directory for the font cache if the user home directory is not write-accessible. Thanks to Alok Singh.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 45342)
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM (fixes bug 45342)
:
AFP Fonts: Fixed interpretation of metric for fonts with fixed metrics and made sure all repeating groups in FNP (Font Position) are processed. Thanks to Emil Maskovsky.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
AFP Output: Added a configuration option to override the resource level defaults in the code.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 46638)
item.description:
Code fix by VH (fixes bug 46638)
:
MinOptMaxUtil.toMinOptMax was converting LengthRangeProperty objects into illegal MinOptMax objects (in some cases opt could be inferior to min).

item.title: Apache FOP Layout add (bug 46315)
item.description:
Layout add by VH (fixes bug 46315)
:
Added extension to disable column balancing before blocks spanning the whole page, in multiple-column documents. Thanks to Georg Datterl.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
AFP Output: Bilevel images in resource groups as generated as hard page segments (instead of image objects) for better interoperability with older IPDS environments and for better printing performance.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts add
item.description:
Fonts add by JM :
FOP now creates ToUnicode CMaps for single-byte fonts that don't use built-in encodings to help PDF text extractors interpreting characters.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts add
item.description:
Fonts add by JM :
Added support for forcing single-byte encodings for TrueType fonts without creating an XML font metric file (see "encoding-mode" attribute on "font" element)

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 45306)
item.description:
Layout fix by JM (fixes bug 45306)
:
Fixed fo:instream-foreign-object inside fo:marker.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
Fixed black backgrounds occurring for transparent images in PCL output.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 46369)
item.description:
Renderers fix by CB (fixes bug 46369)
:
Fixed bug that caused AFP Renderer Extensions to be ignored.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 46319)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 46319)
:
Fixed a memory-leak in Marker.MarkerAttribute, where an instance was used both as key and value in a WeakHashMap, effectively neutralizing the benefit of using WeakReferences. Solved by extending PropertyCache to work for MarkerAttributes as well.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
Fixed a multi-threading issue when rendering SVG.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by AC :
AFP Output: An AFPGraphics2D implementation which provides the ability to use Batik to drive the production of AFP Graphics (GOCA) output from SVG.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by AC :
AFP Output: Resource group leveling, external streaming, and de-duplication of images and graphics using IncludeObject and ResourceGroup.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by AC :
AFP Output: Native image embedding support (e.g. JPEG, GIF, TIFF) using ObjectContainer and a MOD:CA Registry implementation.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix
item.description:
Fonts fix by AC :
More robust AFP font parsing, although it is still in need of some rework in the future.

item.title: Apache FOP Images add (bug 41657)
item.description:
Images add by JM (fixes bug 41657)
:
Added support for SVG 1.2 functionality inside fo:instream-foreign-object.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 46240)
item.description:
Layout fix by AD (fixes bug 46240)
:
Fixed a bug when combining break-before with a span change.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 46211)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 46211)
:
Fixed some multi-threading issues in FontCache.java:
remove the unused private readObject() make the changeLock member final (initialization-safety + impossible to reassign) perform the HashMap check for a failed font inside the synchronized block to avoid a race condition
Thanks to rogov.AT.devexperts.com.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 45113)
item.description:
Renderers add by AD (fixes bug 45113)
:
Added PDF /Launch action: references to URIs using the file:// protocol will now generate a /Launch action as opposed to a more general /URI (which doesn't yield the expected result for this protocol). Thanks to Alexander Stamenov.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix
item.description:
Layout fix by JM :
Fixed a problem where the BPD or a block area could be wrong if there is a nested, absolutely positioned area (for example a block-container).

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 45971)
item.description:
Code fix by VH (fixes bug 45971)
:
Improved the behaviour of the command line interface. Thanks to Tow Browder.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 40798)
item.description:
Layout fix by AD (fixes bug 40798)
:
Bugzilla 40798: A conditional-page-master-reference with page-position="last" qualifies for a first page, if it is also the last. Additionally: also added support for page-position="only".

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 45842)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 45842)
:
Make fop.bat and fop.cmd use the %FOP_OPTS% environment variable. Thanks to Carsten Siedentop.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 45795)
item.description:
Renderers add by JM (fixes bug 45795)
:
PDF Output: Added support for handling 16-bit alpha channel. They are currently converted to 8 bits.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
PDF Output: Made sure the XMP Metadata stream is never compressed.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 45734)
item.description:
Fonts fix by JM (fixes bug 45734)
:
Fix for PFMReader after bug #43089 changed the behavior of PFMFile. Fixes baseline problems when Type 1 fonts are used in conjunction with XML font metric files. Thanks to J. Frantzius.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 45616)
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM (fixes bug 45616)
:
Fix for table handling in RTF output, so the output works with OpenOffice and AbiWord, too. Thanks to Pavel Kysilka.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 45667)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 45667)
:
Quick-fix to avoid a possible NullPointerException when using empty inlines and hyphenation.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout add
item.description:
Layout add by JM :
Added missing generation of areas for empty grid units in tables with collapsing border model.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Fixed memory leak in property cache (not cleaning stale PropertyCache$CacheEntry instances).

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
Fixed text stroking in SVG when the stroke-width is zero.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix
item.description:
Layout fix by JM :
Fixed the source for a division by zero when the content of an fo:leader with leader-pattern="use-content" collapses to zero width during layout.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
Fixed border trait parsing for the area tree XML when CMYK or ICC colors were used.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 45606)
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM (fixes bug 45606)
:
Fixed generation of "fonttbl" for RTF output to fix loading problem with AbiWord. Thanks to Pavel Kysilka.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix
item.description:
Layout fix by JM :
Fixed ID resolution for nested bookmarks with duplicated IDs.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 45490)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 45490)
:
Fixed a slight error when resolving non-file URLs: avoid altering the original 'href' if the protocol is other than 'file:' Thanks to Thomas Stieler.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 45470)
item.description:
Layout fix by JM (fixes bug 45470)
:
Added LayoutManagerMapping.registerMaker() to make registration of custom layout managers easier.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix
item.description:
Layout fix by LF :
Fixed absolute positioning of block-containers when specified using right and bottom instead of left and top.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by AC :
Added PDF encryption parameter support in configuration.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout add
item.description:
Layout add by LF :
Allowing non-zero borders and padding on page regions when relaxed validation is turned on.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix
item.description:
Layout fix by LF :
Fixed an inconsistency in footnote handling that led to unnecessary empty areas in pages whose last normal line contains footnotes when the page bpd is not the same for all pages.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update
item.description:
Code update by AD :
Changed FONode.addCharacters() parameter to closer match the signature of the standard SAX characters() event (reduces confusion and computations). !! Implementors of extensions that subclass FONode directly, and offer an implementation for addCharacters() should take care to make similar modifications in their code !!

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 45115)
item.description:
Renderers add by JM (fixes bug 45115)
:
Added a PCL-specific extension attribute on simple-page-master for controlling the simplex/duplex mode. Thanks to Martin Edge.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 45097)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 45097)
:
Corrected white-space-treatment for situations where an inline-node is the first/last child node of an fo:block, without preceding/following text.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout add
item.description:
Layout add by MB :
Implemented word-by-ford font-selection strategy on text.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout add
item.description:
Layout add by MB :
Support character-by-character font-selection strategy on fo:character element.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 44794)
item.description:
Layout fix by AD (fixes bug 44794)
:
Added support for page-number-citation and page-number-citation-last of fo:inline. Corrected behavior for page-number-citation-last of fo:block: forward references now properly resolved.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts add
item.description:
Fonts add by JM :
For auto-detected fonts it is now possible to specify that a font needs to be referenced rather than embedded (for the output formats that support this distinction).

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 42423)
item.description:
Layout fix by AD (fixes bug 42423)
:
Added support for the "id" attribute on fo:wrappers when used as a child of the fo:flow.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 41500)
item.description:
Layout fix by AD (fixes bug 41500)
:
Fixed a ClassCastException when using an fo:wrapper as a child of an fo:block-container.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts add
item.description:
Fonts add by AC :
Add support for font substitution.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 43650)
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM (fixes bug 43650)
:
PCL Renderer: Improved page format selection so it doesn't interfere with duplex printing.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 42703)
item.description:
Layout fix by AD (fixes bug 42703)
:
Fixed a regression introduced by the fix for Bugzilla 44286.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 43591)
item.description:
Layout fix by AD (fixes bug 43591)
:
Activated min-height/max-height and min-width/max-width properties.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 44203)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 44203)
:
Fixed a logic error in Hyphenator.java: If the source had an associated InputStream, an UnsupportedOperationException was triggered.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 44634)
item.description:
Renderers add by AD (fixes bug 44634)
:
Add partial support for the "show-destination" property on fo:basic-link (PDF output only; see limitations on the compliance page)

item.title: Apache FOP Layout add
item.description:
Layout add by JM :
Added minimal support for integer keep values on the various keep properties on block-level FOs. For now, all integer values are treated the same (i.e. without strength distinction). Using integers allows to avoid overflows that can happen when "always" is used extensively.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
Added support for rendering pages using JPS (Java Printing System). See new example: examples/embedding/java/ExamplesFO2JPSPrint.java

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 41687)
item.description:
Renderers add by JM (fixes bug 41687)
:
Restored ability to specify from/to and odd/even pages as well as the number of copies for printing from the command-line.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 44678)
item.description:
Renderers add by JM (fixes bug 44678)
:
Added ability to pass a preconfigured PrinterJob instance to the PrintRenderer via the rendering options map. Thanks to Antti Karanta.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 44743)
item.description:
Renderers add by JM (fixes bug 44743)
:
Added a public accessor for reference to the current page to PDFGraphics2D. Thanks to Yegor Kozlov.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts add (bug 44737)
item.description:
Fonts add by JM (fixes bug 44737)
:
Added support for auto-configuring TrueType Collections. XML font metrics files for *.ttc fonts are not required anymore. Thanks to Jason Harrop.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers update
item.description:
Renderers update by JM :
When a JPEG image is embedded, an optionally embedded color profile is filtered out as it's already embedded separately in the PDF file.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts add
item.description:
Fonts add by JM :
Added support for addressing all glyphs available in a Type 1 font, not just the ones in the font's primary encoding.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
Added an event handling framework which allows to get better feedback from within FOP with the ability to customize problem management.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
Fixed a color selection problem which occurred after an image has been painted through the Graphics2DAdapter in PDF output.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 41306)
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM (fixes bug 41306)
:
Fixed page ordering problem with AWTRenderer.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 39980)
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM (fixes bug 39980)
:
Fixed image scaling for RTF output.

item.title: Apache FOP API fix
item.description:
API fix by JM :
Fixed the -imagein command-line option.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 43825)
item.description:
Renderers add by JM (fixes bug 43825)
:
Added support for fo:leader for RTF output (no full support!). Fixes problems with empty leaders being used to force empty lines among other issues. Thanks to Maximilian Aster.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 43824)
item.description:
Renderers add by JM (fixes bug 43824)
:
Added support for page-number-citation for RTF output. Thanks to Maximilian Aster.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 43606)
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM (fixes bug 43606)
:
Fixed handling of proportional-column-width() and percentages for table column in RTF output. Thanks to Maximilian Aster.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 45295)
item.description:
Layout fix by AD (fixes bug 45295)
:
Fixed NullPointerException when page-number-citations are used inside a marker.

item.title: Apache FOP Images fix
item.description:
Images fix by JM :
Fixed two bugs concerning resolution handling with SVG images and their conversion to bitmaps for RTF output.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 44887)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 44887)
:
Fixed potential multi-threading problem concerning the use of DecimalFormat.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 44412)
item.description:
Layout fix by JM (fixes bug 44412)
:
Regression bugfix: Multiple collapsible breaks don't cause empty pages anymore.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
Fixed resolution handling inside AWT preview dialog.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
Fixed positioning of absolutely positioned block-containers in multi-column documents.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
Fixed rendering of fixed block-containers in AFP output.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 44621)
item.description:
Layout fix by VH (fixes bug 44621)
:
Various bugfixes for table layout.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
Fixed regression causing bad positioning of block-containers if used as descendant of a table-cell.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix
item.description:
Fonts fix by JM :
Fixed text extraction problem with ZapfDingbats and Symbol font in PDF output.

item.title: Apache FOP Images fix
item.description:
Images fix by JM :
Fixed a performance problem concerning image serialization.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix
item.description:
Fonts fix by JM :
Fixed NullPointerException when loading a TrueType font using XML font metric files.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 44412)
item.description:
Layout fix by JM (fixes bug 44412)
:
Bugfix: The before border of a block is no longer swallowed if its first child issues a break-before.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 44412)
item.description:
Layout fix by JM (fixes bug 44412)
:
Bugfix: When there was a forced break after a block with (conditional) borders the border-after wasn't painted.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix
item.description:
Layout fix by VH :
Bugfix: a forced break inside a cell was ignored when occurring before the minimum height set on the enclosing row was set.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix
item.description:
Layout fix by JM :
Fixed exceptions when lists, tables or block-container are children of an inline-level FO.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout add
item.description:
Layout add by VH :
Added support for background on fo:table-column and fo:table-header/footer/body elements.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix
item.description:
Layout fix by VH :
Fixed the rendering of the area of a table corresponding to border-separation, which must be filled with the background of the table, and not the rows.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix
item.description:
Layout fix by VH :
Improved conformance: even if a table-cell spans several rows its background must correspond to the first row spanned.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
Slight improvement for thin lines in Java2D/AWT output. Thanks to Gordon Cooke.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout add
item.description:
Layout add by VH :
Added full support for keep-with-previous on fo:table-row and in fo:table-cell elements.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by MB :
Turned on XInclude processing for the main source given on the command line.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 44451)
item.description:
Fonts fix by JM (fixes bug 44451)
:
Improved the font auto-detection so fonts accessed using the font-family name are selected with higher accuracy. Thanks to Justus Piater.

item.title: Apache FOP API remove
item.description:
API remove by JM :
Removed deprecated methods in the "apps" package that were left-overs from the API discussions.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts add
item.description:
Fonts add by JM :
Added support for unusual font encodings (like for Symbol or Cyrillic fonts) of Type 1 fonts in PDF and PostScript output.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 44321)
item.description:
Layout fix by VH (fixes bug 44321)
:
Moved to the FO tree stage the check for break-before/after on table-row while spanning in progress.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout add
item.description:
Layout add by VH :
Added full support for breaks before and after table cells (that is, break-before/after set on the first/last child of a cell).

item.title: Apache FOP Layout add
item.description:
Layout add by VH :
Added full support for breaks inside the cells of a table.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 41631)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 41631)
:
Added correct percentage resolution for arguments to the proportional-column-width() function.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix
item.description:
Fonts fix by JM :
Bugfix for date formatting with negative time zones in the PDF's Info object. This affected PDF/A compliance.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
Added an option to disable the default sRGB profile in PDF output for those who don't care about color fidelity, but care about PDF file size.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 43705)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 43705)
:
Fixed a bug when the rgb-icc() function was used either before the fo:declarations, or in documents without a fo:declarations node. In such cases, the sRGB fallback is now used to avoid an ugly NullPointerException.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by AD :
Added very basic parsing for the xml:lang shorthand.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 44343)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 44343)
:
Fixed a bug when using relative font-size (smaller/larger) in combination with percentages.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix
item.description:
Fonts fix by JM :
Bugfix for handling of optional tables in subset TrueType fonts. This bug caused errors in various PDF viewers.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
Added support for the natural language indentifier ("Lang" in the document catalog) for PDF documents based on the language/country values on fo:page-sequence.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 44286)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 44286)
:
Fixed a memory-leak in XMLWhiteSpaceHandler. Thanks to Stefan Ziel.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 44289)
item.description:
Layout fix by VH (fixes bug 44289)
:
Fixed the resolution of borders when header/footer is omitted at page breaks.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout add (bug 43934)
item.description:
Layout add by VH (fixes bug 43934)
:
Added support for conditional borders in tables, for both the separate and the collapsing border model.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 44160)
item.description:
Layout fix by JM (fixes bug 44160)
:
Fixed a possible IndexOutOfBoundsException that could happen with certain constellations when footnotes are used.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix
item.description:
Layout fix by JM :
Compliance fix: for absolutely positioned block-containers, "top" wasn't interpreted correctly.

item.title: Apache FOP Extensions add
item.description:
Extensions add by JM :
New extension attribute fox:transform on fo:block-container allows free-form transformation (rotation, scaling etc.) of absolute and fixed block-containers. Supported only for PDF, PS and Java2D-based renderers.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
Fixed logic error setting the transformation matrix for block-container viewports (applies to absolute and fixed block-containers only). Important: External renderer implementations need to adjust for the change and implement the new method concatenateTransformationMatrix(AffineTransform) if the renderer is derived from AbstractPathOrientedRenderer.

item.title: Apache FOP Images fix
item.description:
Images fix by JM :
A new image loading framework has been introduced to fix various problems with external graphics and improve performance.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
Fixed generation of named destinations so it works when the PDF document is encrypted.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
PostScript output now generates the bounding box DSC comments for the whole document.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
Added support for PDF page labels.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 44176)
item.description:
Renderers add by JM (fixes bug 44176)
:
Added support for custom fonts in Java2DRenderer and derived renderers. Thanks to Patrick Jaromin.

item.title: Apache FOP Extensions add
item.description:
Extensions add by JM :
Added new extension element: fox:external-document. It allows to add whole documents such as multi-page TIFF images to be inserted as peers to a page-sequence. Each image will make up an entire page. See the documentation for details.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout add
item.description:
Layout add by JM :
Added minimal support for the .minimum/.maximum components of block/inline-progression-dimension on fo:external-graphic and fo:instream-foreign-object.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout add
item.description:
Layout add by JM :
Added support for scale-down-to-fit and scale-up-to-fit (introduced in XSL 1.1).

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 43633)
item.description:
Layout fix by VH (fixes bug 43633)
:
Bugfix: content of a row with zero height overriding the previous row

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 37993)
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM (fixes bug 37993)
:
Bugfix: allow multiple bookmarks to point at the same destination.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 43917)
item.description:
Layout fix by JM (fixes bug 43917)
:
Bugfix for border-after painting and element list generation when a forced break is involved.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 40230)
item.description:
Layout fix by JM (fixes bug 40230)
:
Bugfix: no empty page is generated anymore if there's no content after a break-after.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 43803)
item.description:
Layout fix by VH (fixes bug 43803)
:
Restored proper handling of fo:table-cell having no children, which is allowed in relaxed validation mode.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix
item.description:
Layout fix by JM :
Memory Leak fixed in the Property Cache. Fixed by Jeremias Maerki. Reported and Tested By Chris Bowditch.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 43712)
item.description:
Layout fix by VH (fixes bug 43712)
:
Bugfix in tables: wrong element generation by the merging algorithm when glues must be produced to cope with conditional spaces. The corresponding length was added twice: one in the glue itself and one in the following box.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix for URI resolution: Make StreamSources without system identifier work again.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 43910)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 43910)
:
Avoid a NullPointerException in AreaTreeHandler.endDocument(). Thanks to David Delbecq.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 43766)
item.description:
Layout fix by VH (fixes bug 43766)
:
Bugfix: breaks generated by the merging algorithm for a table-row containing empty cells had always a penalty of 900.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout add (bug 43605)
item.description:
Layout add by JM (fixes bug 43605)
:
Added methods for fo:page-number-citation(-last) in FOEventHandler. Thanks to V. Schappert.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout add
item.description:
Layout add by VH :
Step towards performance: the collapsing-border resolution algorithm no longer triggers the retrieving of the whole table, when possible.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix
item.description:
Layout fix by VH :
In case of missing cells the border-end of the table was applied to an inner cell, instead of the (empty) cell in the last column.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix
item.description:
Layout fix by VH :
Fixed the resolution of borders with table-columns (border-before/after was wrongly applied to every cell of the column).

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 42768)
item.description:
Layout fix by VH (fixes bug 42768)
:
Fixed the resolution of border-end on cells spanning several rows.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 43835)
item.description:
Fonts fix by JM (fixes bug 43835)
:
Bugfix: Use Font.getName() (logical font name) instead of Font.getFontName() (localized) when registering fonts from AWT. Thanks to David Churavy.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix
item.description:
Fonts fix by JM :
Made the way TrueType fonts are embedded in PDF compliant to the specification so viewers correctly identify subset fonts.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix
item.description:
Fonts fix by JM :
Fixed font-autodetection so fonts with uppercase extensions are detected, too.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts update
item.description:
Fonts update by JM :
Improved font auto-detection and handling of AWT-supplied fonts in order to achieve better results when using multiple output formats. Whenever possible, the font names appearing in the operating system can also be used in XSL-FO.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
Fixed regression: transparent-page-background was not recognized for PNG output.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout add
item.description:
Layout add by VH :
Added check for table-cells which span more rows than available in their parent element (table-header/footer/body).

item.title: Apache FOP Layout add
item.description:
Layout add by AD :
Added support for fo:markers in fo:inline and fo:basic-link.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers update
item.description:
Renderers update by JM :
PDF Transcoder (SVG) text painting has been completely rewritten. Except for some special cases (with filters for example), all text (including flow text) is now painted using PDF text operators.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout add (bug 42748)
item.description:
Layout add by AD (fixes bug 42748)
:
Added support for ids on empty fo:inlines.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts add (bug 42982)
item.description:
Fonts add by AC (fixes bug 42982)
:
Add Font support in jar files. Thanks to Max Berger.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 43042)
item.description:
Renderers fix by AC (fixes bug 43042)
:
Postscript extension cleanup. Thanks to Andrejus Chaliapinas.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 43587)
item.description:
Renderers fix by AC (fixes bug 43587)
:
Fix to avoid ClassCastException where multiple ps:ps-comments are declared within fo:declarations.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 43143)
item.description:
Fonts fix by AC (fixes bug 43143)
:
Fix to avoid NullPointerException when parsing ExpertEncoded and ExpertSubsetEncoded Type 1 fonts.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 43439)
item.description:
Renderers fix by AC (fixes bug 43439)
:
Fixes missing TLE value attribute when using AreaTree input with the AFP renderer.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
Added generic structures to the PDF library in order to support PDF file in fo:external-graphic later.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 43597)
item.description:
Code add by JM (fixes bug 43597)
:
Added support for SVGZ. Thanks to Max Berger.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix
item.description:
Layout fix by JM :
Bugfix for NPE with empty table-row (regression from 0.93).

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
Added a configuration setting to the PCL renderer to disable PJL commands.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 43464)
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM (fixes bug 43464)
:
Fix to avoid a ClassCastException in renderer configuration. Thanks to Bruno Feurer.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 43439)
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM (fixes bug 43439)
:
Fixed the restoration of the TLE values from the intermediate format for the AFP extension elements. Thanks to Adrian Cumiskey.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 43041)
item.description:
Renderers add by JM (fixes bug 43041)
:
Added a configuration setting for the renderer/device resolution to the AFP renderer. Thanks to Adrian Cumiskey.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout update
item.description:
Layout update by AD :
Facilitate the implementation for font-selection-strategy: • Changed FontInfo.fontLookup to always return an array of FontTriplet. • Changed CommonFont.getFontState to return an array of FontTriplet. • Initial modifications to the related LMs: initialized with the font corresponding to the first of the triplets.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout update
item.description:
Layout update by AD :
PropertyCache phase 2: • improvement of the PropertyCache itself should now guarantee acceptable performance of the static caches in multi-session environments, which is a possible problem with synchronizedMap. • changed CommonFont to use the cache: added CachedCommonFont to contain the properties that are always cacheable CommonFont itself is only cached if the remaining properties are absolutes. • changed CommonHyphenation, KeepProperty, ColorProperty and FontFamilyProperty to use the cache.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 42705)
item.description:
Layout fix by AD (fixes bug 42705)
:
Fixed swallowing PCDATA in text-node children of retrieved markers.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 42703)
item.description:
Layout fix by AD (fixes bug 42703)
:
Fixed erroneous white-space removal in retrieved markers.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 43274)
item.description:
Layout fix by AD (fixes bug 43274)
:
Fixed erroneous usage of inherited color-values in SVG. Thanks to ckohrn.at.tng.de.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
AFP Renderer: Bugfix for 1 bit images where the width is not a multiple of 8.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by MM :
Support for keep-together.within-line="always".

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by MM :
Fixed incomplete support for Unicode Word Joiner characters (U+2060 and U+FEFF).

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by VH :
Add support for conditional spaces in table-cells.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 42785)
item.description:
Code add by AD (fixes bug 42785)
:
Support alignment-adjust for images. Thanks to Max Berger.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 41044)
item.description:
Code add by AD (fixes bug 41044)
:
Partial application of the patch in Bugzilla 41044: * addition of a generic PropertyCache to be used by all Property types that can be safely canonicalized * modified EnumProperty, StringProperty, NumberProperty, EnumNumber and FixedLength to make use of the cache infrastructure Thanks to Richard Wheeldon.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update (bug 41656)
item.description:
Code update by AD (fixes bug 41656)
:
Refactoring in the fo package: -> removal of the childNodes instance member in fop.fo.FObj -> addition of a firstChild instance member in fop.fo.FObj -> addition of a siblings instance member in fop.fo.FONode -> addition of a FONodeIterator interface in FONode + corresponding implementation in FObj -> changed implementations of FObj.addChildNode(), .removeChild() and .getChildNodes()

item.title: Apache FOP Code update (bug 42089)
item.description:
Code update by AD (fixes bug 42089)
:
Code cleanup and restructuring: Refactoring of PageSequenceLayoutManager and provide common FObj id property use Thanks to Adrian Cumiskey.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by AD :
Slight improvement of relative font-weight handling in the properties package.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update
item.description:
Code update by JM :
Updated PDF/A-1b support according to ISO-19005-1:2005/Cor.1:2007.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 41831)
item.description:
Code add by JM (fixes bug 41831)
:
Add support for font auto-detection (easier font configuration). Thanks to Adrian Cumiskey.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update (bug 42406)
item.description:
Code update by JM (fixes bug 42406)
:
Use source resolution setting for bitmap images which don't provide their own resolution. Thanks to Hussein Shafie.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 42109)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 42109)
:
Fixed the rendering of zero-width spaces for certain fonts by not generating them into the area tree. Thanks to Paul Vinkenoog.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by LF :
Fixed a problem with disappearing footnotes inside hyphenated inlines (and footnotes with hyphenated inline child).

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 42067)
item.description:
Code add by JM (fixes bug 42067)
:
Add support for exact positioning of internal PDF links. Thanks to Paul Vinkenoog.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 41434)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 41434)
:
Fix PDF Genaration for non-ASCII compatible locales. Thanks to Martin Kögler.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by VH :
