Fix several exceptions when break-before/after is set on the first/last row of a table.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by VH :
Fix extra page break when break-before is set on both a table and its first row.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by VH :
Make keep-with-next and keep-with-previous work on fo:table.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 36934)
item.description:
Code add by VH, JM (fixes bug 36934)
:
Add support for the collapsing-border model in tables.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JB :
Add support for named destinations in PDF.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Fixed a problem with keep-with-next on table-rows. Once a keep-with-next was set inside a table, the FO following the table would always be glued to the previous table.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Fixed a problem with the auto-rotate-landscape setting in the PostScript renderer. It didn't generate the right setpagedevice command.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Fixed an IllegalArgumentException for absolutely positioned block-containers with a border and no height/bpd set.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
Add support for a two-pass production for PostScript output to minimize file size. This adds images only once and adds only the fonts that are really used.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 41652)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 41652)
:
If a line contained nothing but a linefeed, this didn't produce empty lines. Replaced the auxiliary zero-width box with a glue the width of a line, and shrinkable to zero-width.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 40120)
item.description:
Code fix by VH (fixes bug 40120)
:
Stricter FOP user configuration checking Thanks to Adrian Cumiskey.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 41572)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 41572)
:
Fix parsing 'url(...)' when the URL itself contains a bracketed part. Thanks to Erwin Tratar.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
Support for GIF images in RTF output (RTF handler, only. Does not affect the RTF library.)

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Fix for NPE with PNG images for RTF output.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by AD :
Fix for properly parsing font-family names containing spaces.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
Support for soft masks (transparency) with ImageIO image adapter.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 41019)
item.description:
Code fix by LF (fixes bug 41019)
:
Fix incorrect behaviour of the BreakingAlgorithm when some inline content is wider than the available ipd, causing a restart.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Fix for PDF corruption when a TrueType font with spaces in its name is embedded and no XML font metrics file for that font is used.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 41426)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 41426)
:
Fix for ClassCastException when fo:wrapper was used as direct child of fo:flow. Note: "id" attributes are still not handled properly on fo:wrapper! Thanks to Adrian Cumiskey.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by MM :
Added support for the soft hyphen (SHY) character.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by MM :
Added support for line-height-shift-adjustment property.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by SP :
Added support for the system property fop.home to cli.Main.getJARList().

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 40930)
item.description:
Code add by JM (fixes bug 40930)
:
Added support for display-align for table-cell in RTF output.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by MM :
Added support for UAX#14 type line breaking. Support does not extend across nested fo:inline elements.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by BD :
Added support for the use of Open Type fonts

item.title: Apache FOP Code update (bug 5535)
item.description:
Code update by BD (fixes bug 5535)
:
Enabled Copy/Paste from PDF content in Acrobat Reader for text using embedded TrueType fonts. Thanks to Adam Strzelecki, Victor Mote.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update (bug 41044)
item.description:
Code update by SP (fixes bug 41044)
:
Commented out unused properties, in order to minimize memory usage. Thanks to Richard Wheeldon.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update (bug 41009)
item.description:
Code update by SP (fixes bug 41009)
:
Removed unused attributes from TableCell. Thanks to Richard Wheeldon.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
Added initial support for loading fonts without a pre-created XML font metric file.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 40729)
item.description:
Code add by JM (fixes bug 40729)
:
Support for the rgb-icc() function and for a proprietary cmyk() function (for device CMYK colors only through the PDF renderer so far). Thanks to Peter Coppens.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update (bug 40813)
item.description:
Code update by JM (fixes bug 40813)
:
Minor fixes and improvements for the AWT Preview (keyboard shortcuts, scrolling, windows setup). Thanks to Richard Wheeldon.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 40849)
item.description:
Code add by JM (fixes bug 40849)
:
Added support for SVG in fo:instream-foreign objects for RTF output. Thanks to Dominic Brügger.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: Fixed bug when the sum of column widths of a table is larger than the specified widths. The table width was not adjusted.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: Nested tables with headers and footers were not handled correctly and could overlap with the region-after.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 40519)
item.description:
Code add by JM (fixes bug 40519)
:
Added support for CCITT compression in the TIFFRenderer by switching to the ImageWriter abstraction from XML Graphics Commons. Thanks to Oliver Hernàndez Valls.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
Extension properties fox:orphan-content-limit and fox:widow-content-limit which help with list-block and table layout. See the documentation for details.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
Configuration option in the Java2D-based renderers that allows to disable the default white background in order to produce bitmap output with transparency.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 39414)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 39414)
:
Split up FOText instances larger than 32K characters to avoid integer overflow during layout.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: Corrected painting of shading patterns and position of links for SVG images inside FO documents.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update
item.description:
Code update by AD :
Minor fix: correctly set negative values for ipd/bpd to zero.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update (bug 35656)
item.description:
Code update by AD (fixes bug 35656)
:
Rework of default column-creation / column-width setting from cells in the first row.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update (bug 40270)
item.description:
Code update by AD (fixes bug 40270)
:
Added relaxed validation for empty list-item-*, as suggested by Gary Reed. Thanks to Gary Reed.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update
item.description:
Code update by AD :
Modified proportional-column-width() function to log an error if used with table-layout=auto

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by AD :
Deferred property resolution for markers until they are actually retrieved, which leads to percentages and relative font-sizes now getting the correct values. Also deferred white-space-handling for markers.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update
item.description:
Code update by JM :
Changed the way overflowing pages are handled. The overflow property on region-body is now used to define the behaviour.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Fixed a memory-leak: The FO tree part of a page-sequence was not released when a page-sequence was finished.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: Table headers and footers were swallowed when a table was nested in a list-block.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Fixed a bug with indent handling when margins are used on a surrounding block and not start/end-indent.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 40106)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 40106)
:
Compatibility fix for GCJ (GNU Classpath): Using "UTF-16BE" instead of "UnicodeBigUnmarked" encoding. Thanks to Jeroen Meijer.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 40062)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 40062)
:
Fixed handling for CCITT Group 4 TIFF images with fill order 2. Thanks to Gilles Beaugeais.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 40048)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 40048)
:
Fixed setting of page margins in AWT Renderer like it was done in the print renderer. Thanks to Igor Istomin.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Fixed two memory-leaks in image handling. The image cache is finally working properly.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 39608)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 39608)
:
Let numeric property values without a unit be treated as pixels like in HTML. This fixes certain NullPointerException when no units are specified. (Note: the use of pixels in XSL-FO is discouraged!)

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: Potential multi-threading issue (ConcurrentModificationException) eliminated for ElementMapping classes.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
No more System.exit() and look & feel setting calls inside the reusable parts of the AWT viewer.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Proper escaping of characters in list-items labels for RTF output.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by MM :
Bugfix: FOUserAgent specific configuration parameters specified in config file were not set when FOP was invoked from command line.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
Added support for PDF/A-1b and PDF/X-3:2003. (Note: this may still be a bit incomplete. Feedback is welcome!)

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
The CIDSet object is now generated for CID fonts which are embedded in PDFs. (Required by PDF/A).

item.title: Apache FOP Code update
item.description:
Code update by JM :
The Java2DRenderer (and therefore the print and bitmap renderers) is now offering the same quality as the PDF and PS renderers. Note: There can still be little differences between PDF and Print/PNG/TIFF because the latter uses a different font metrics source.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 39712)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 39712)
:
Bugfix: components of the border-separation property weren't set when in shorthand-mode, leading to a NPE being thrown.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: Table headers were omitted when a table is a child of a block-container.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: Bookmarks in PDF will be generated even if some bookmarks cannot be resolved.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 39560)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 39560)
:
Bugfix: the interaction between the table FOs and properties package in determining initial values for column-number should be a one-time process, not repeated when the table is in a marker that is retrieved.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: All fonts names were converted unnecessarily to lower case in RTF output.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: The combination of hyphenation and kerning resulted in slightly ragged right ends for right-aligned and justified text.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: NullPointerException in AreaAdditionUtil in a table-cell spanning multiple pages and with a marker.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 39533)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 39533)
:
Bugfix: NullPointerException in RTF output when a table does not contain table-columns.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 39607)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 39607)
:
Bugfix: NullPointerException in RTF library when there are no borders on the parent table. Thanks to Julien Aymé.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
Automatic support for all fonts available to the Java2D subsystem for all Java2D-descendant renderers (TIFF, PNG, print, AWT).

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: Improved baseline detection in TTFReader for TrueType fonts.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 39443)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 39443)
:
Bugfix: tables nested in inline elements caused a NullPointerException.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update
item.description:
Code update by JM :
The default sRGB color profile provided by the Java class library is no longer embedded if it is encountered. This should reduce the PDF size considerably.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 39443)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 39443)
:
Bugfix: Sections with span="all" lead to overlapping text if spanning multiple pages.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by MM :
Bugfix: Percentages in vertical-align property values were not correctly handled.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 38243)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 38243)
:
Bugfix: Gaps in table-columns cause a NullPointerException. Thanks to Gerhard Oettl.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update (bug 38946)
item.description:
Code update by JM (fixes bug 38946)
:
Changed the internal representation of colors to use Java's own color infrastructure instead of FOP's home-grown classes. Thanks to Max Berger.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by MM :
Bugfix: TABs were not correctly replaced by spaces in some circumstances.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update
item.description:
Code update by JM :
Content in block-containers makes better use of shrink to fit content vertically into the available area. This can be used indirectly to justify content vertically in a block-container.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: basic-links with internal destinations in documents with multiple page-sequences sometimes pointed at the wrong page.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: Fixed ClassCastException when retrieve-marker is used as a direct child if static-content in which case leading and trailing white space is not properly removed.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 39285)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 39285)
:
Bugfix: Fixed OutOfMemoryException with long data URLs (RFC 2397).

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 39118)
item.description:
Code add by JM (fixes bug 39118)
:
Initial support for page-number-citation-last (XSL 1.1). Works without problems only for page-sequence so far. Thanks to Pierre-Henri Kraus.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: The generation of the PDF "d" (setdash) command was assuming that only integer values can be used but that isn't the case. Dash patterns PDFGraphics2D would be wrong in the process.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: Fixed a division by zero problem in TTFReader and improved the detection of the capHeight and xHeight font metric values for TrueType fonts.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: Allow URLs in basic-link's external-destination to be wrapped in "url()".

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by MM :
Bugfix: Corrected enumerated property value for white-space property from "no-wrap" to "nowrap".

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 38457)
item.description:
Code fix by MM (fixes bug 38457)
:
Bugfix: Added support for white-space-treatment="preserve" in particular to support the white-space="pre" short hand property.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Corrected expectation and behaviour for the text-indent property to only apply to the first line area generated by a block.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix for invalid handling of ICC color profiles in JPEG images and for dealing with CMYK JPEG images with the Adobe APPE marker.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
Initial support for page-position="last" added.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
Reenabled loading of user-supplied hyphenation patterns that was available in FOP 0.20.5. (See "hyphenation-base" option in the user configuration)

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: Certain filter combinations in PDF could lead to invalid PDFs. DecodeParams were not properly handled.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: CCITT Group 4 encoded TIFF images with multiple strips are now properly embedded in PDF files.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
Added support for fixed-width spaces.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
Added support for kerning.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: Fixed a copy/paste error in the table layout code that caused wrong page break decisions when table-headers and/or table-footers are used.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: Fixed an NPE that was thrown when a table was used inside a footnote-body.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: Fixed a problem with certain TrueType fonts which are missing the "PCLT" table, where a baseline-shift="sub" had no effect due to a missing x-height value. (Note: This only affects TTFReader, so the font metric file has to be regenerated.)

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: When the base URL was specified as a file system path, the constructed URL was wrong.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
Support for "userconfig" attribute in FOP Ant Task. Thanks to Jirí Mareš.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
Initial support for XMP metadata (PDF 1.4) under fo:declarations.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by AD :
Added support for the background-position shorthand property.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by AD :
Added support for the font shorthand property.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 38618)
item.description:
Code add by JM (fixes bug 38618)
:
Added support for system-color() function. Thanks to Max Berger.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: Fixed two causes for ClassCastExceptions in BlockContainerLayoutManager.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: padding-top and padding-bottom on list-items could lead to wrong page break decisions and thus to overlapping text.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: break-before and break-after were ignored on list-items.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 38507)
item.description:
Code fix by LF (fixes bug 38507)
:
Bugfix: The elements representing a non-breaking space weren't always correct.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 38453)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 38453)
:
Bugfix: Text-decoration was not promoted if no text-decoration attribute was specified on a nested element.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 38282)
item.description:
Code add by AD (fixes bug 38282)
:
Added support for the from-table-column() function. Thanks to Gerhard Oettl (gerhard.oettl.at.oesoft.at).

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 38397)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 38397)
:
Bugfix: Spanned cells could lead to an false error message about overlapping cells and ultimately a NullPointerException.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: Regions with non-standard names got ignored in RTF output leading to missing headers and footers.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
The RTF output now properly generates the "\landscape" flag for documents in landscape orientation.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Following a clarification by the XSL FO SG, space traits are only set on the first and last area generated by an FO, and not on every area anymore.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
New feature: "Intermediate format" (IF). The IF is basically the XML dialect written by the area tree renderer (XMLRenderer). A new parser for this format allows reparsing a serialized and possibly modified area tree and rendering it to the final target format.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: Floating point numbers were not properly formatted in the PDF renderer which could lead to error messages while opening a PDF in Acrobat Reader.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update (bug 38098)
item.description:
Code update by SP (fixes bug 38098)
:
Implement property name as default argument on some xsl-function calls. Thanks to Gerhard Oettl.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update (bug 38087)
item.description:
Code update by SP (fixes bug 38087)
:
Implement force-page-count property of page-sequence. Thanks to Gerhard Oettl.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 38054)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 38054)
:
Bugfix: Spans that end up with a negative height don't get swallowed anymore.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 36729)
item.description:
Code add by MM (fixes bug 36729)
:
Relative URLs for the font configuration attributes metrics-url and embed-url are now supported. A new configuration property font-base has been added. It sets the base URL against which relative font URLs are resolved. If font-base is not set base is used.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 38132)
item.description:
Code add by JM (fixes bug 38132)
:
Added support for RFC2397 "data" URLs. Thanks to Richard Wheeldon.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 38132)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 38132)
:
Bugfix: Certain border styles could lead to a NullPointerException.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 38102)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 38102)
:
Bugfix: Space was not adjusted if the space was on a nested block. This could lead to content overflowing the bottom of a page.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: TableCell did not properly report that it generates reference-areas which could lead to wrong inherited values for start-indent and end-indent.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
The font loading code now reads the encoding value from the XML font metrics file so that fonts like Symbol and ZapfDingbats can be embedded explicitely (Required by PDF/A).

item.title: Apache FOP Code update
item.description:
Code update by SP :
Improvements to the code for inline block content.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 38089)
item.description:
Code fix by MM (fixes bug 38089)
:
Bugfix: Image height for BMP images was incorrectly calculated

item.title: Apache FOP Code update
item.description:
Code update by AD :
Revision of refinement white-space handling.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by AD :
Added feature: support for white-space shorthand

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by AD :
Added feature: support for page-break-* shorthands

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 38053)
item.description:
Code fix by MM (fixes bug 38053)
:
Bugfix: NullPointerException on certain fo:inline within lists.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 37743)
item.description:
Code fix by MM (fixes bug 37743)
:
Bugfix: ClassCastException on certain fo:inline with border combinations.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by MM :
Changed a method name in LineArea from finalize to finalise because it was never intended for the method to be an override of the Java Object finalize method. If invoked by the Java garbage collector it may cause a NPE.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update
item.description:
Code update by JM :
Deprecated Fop constructors that use integer constants to select the output format have been removed in favor or the constructors that use MIME types.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by MM :
Fixed a bug where the linefeed-treatment property value "preserve" was not honoured when used in conjunction with text-align="center".

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 37964)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 37964)
:
Bugfix: hard breaks with even-page or odd-page were not handled correctly when spaces were surrounding the break.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update
item.description:
Code update by JM :
Changed the XMLHandler interface so it doesn't report the MIME type it supports but instead can report whether it supports a particular Renderer implementation. XMLHandlers are now configurable.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Fixed a bug where SVG content could be clipped when rendered to PostScript.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Changed the way resolutions are handled. The single resolution in the user agent got split up into source and target resolutions. For more info, see the updated documentation. Note: backwards-incompatible change!

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 37875)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 37875)
:
Bugfix: Some content inside a table-header may not have been renderered on pages n > 1 in certain conditions.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by MM :
Fixed a bug where an empty line, i.e. a block containing only a  , was not rendered at all.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Fixed a bug where the area for a finished cell that is broken over pages was created once for each row it was spanned over instead of only once.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
Added checks that warn about tables and block-containers that are wider than the available content area.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 37880)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 37880)
:
Bugfix: Footnotes were lost if the footnote appeared in centered text.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update
item.description:
Code update by JM :
Improved log and error messages in a number of places by adding additional context information that should make it easier to find the location in the source files.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Fix to correct image sizes in RTF output.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
First attempt at SVG support in RTF output. SVG images are converted to 300dpi JPEG images internally.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update
item.description:
Code update by JM :
Additional checks to detect text overflows. The overflow property is now properly handled where applicable.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update
item.description:
Code update by JM :
Source location information improved. If location information is not available, the context information is provided based on text content.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
The command-line now automatically sets two parameters for any XSLT transformation: "fop-output-format" contains the MIME type of the currently selected output format, "fop-version" contains FOP's version number.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
The output file is now deleted when an exception occurs when calling FOP from the command-line.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: Areas for table-cells that are broken over more than one page are now generated even if all its content is already painted on a previous page. This fixes strange effects like a table grid that is not completely painted.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 37828)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 37828)
:
Bugfix: Column balancing produced strange break decisions in certain multi-column documents with large amounts of text.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
Added an alternative set of rules for calculating text indents which tries to mimic the behaviour of many commercial FO implementations that chose to break the rules in the FO specification in order to better meet the natural expectations of inexperienced FO users.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 37815)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 37815)
:
Bugfix: The combination of content-width="scale-to-fit" and content-height="100%" did not work as expected due to a datatype conversion bug. Thanks to Tom Craddock.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 37813)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 37813)
:
Bugfix: A span="all" on the first block cause a subsequent page break and the first block didn't span all columns.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: Self-created OutputStreams in PNG Renderer were not properly closed.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update
item.description:
Code update by JM :
The border-collapse property on fo:table is now forced to the value "separate" until the collapsing border has been implemented.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
font-family list still not fully supported but a comma-separated list is now properly tokenized. FOP will now go through all fonts in the list to find one that is available, but it doesn't do so per character, yet.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
Implemented "Overconstrained Geometry" rules (5.3.4, XSL 1.0) for the most important cases.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: Relatively positioned BlockViewports (from block-containers) caused the paint cursor not be be properly advanced when space-before or space-after were present.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix: Space resolution was incomplete for content in table-cells. Conditional elements didn't get removed.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
The validation check for non-zero borders and padding on a region-* and for empty static-content elements is now turned off when relaxed validation is active to improve compatibility with FO documents written for other FO implementations.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix for "/ by zero" ArithmeticExceptions when an URL to a non-existing image is used and content-width and/or content-height is used.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix for a multi-threading problem: propertyListTable initialization moved from the constructor to a static block in FONode. This fixes NullPointerExceptions in PropertyList.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Bugfix for placement of text inside a text area when borders are present in PostScript output.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update
item.description:
Code update by JM :
Improvements on leader painting in PDF output.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
Support for leader painting in PostScript output.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by LF, MM :
Support for hyphenation-ladder-count.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update
item.description:
Code update by all :
Complete redesign of the FOP codebase in the period between Dec 2001 and Nov 2005. There are just too many changes to list here. If you like to know details, run "svn log --verbose http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/fop/trunk/".

item.title: Apache FOP Code update
item.description:
Code update by all :
For the change log for the maintenance branch (where FOP 0.20.5 came from), please see the "CHANGES" file in the distribution, or the CHANGES file in the SVN repository.

item.title: Apache FOP Test fix
item.description:
Test fix by GA :
Fix errors and warnings in example files. Add build.xml for documentation examples.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 53458)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 53458)
:
Fix incorrect language and country code key generation in hyphenation tree cache. Thanks to Dieter von Holten.

item.title: Apache FOP Images fix (bug 53431)
item.description:
Images fix by GA (fixes bug 53431)
:
Fix incorrect SVG line dash pattern with PDF output format. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Images update (bug 40676)
item.description:
Images update by GA (fixes bug 40676)
:
Fix interoperability issue with Adobe reader regarding use of multiple filters. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by GA :
Eliminate javadocs warnings.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 52338)
item.description:
Renderers add by VH (fixes bug 52338)
:
Added possibility to embed TrueType fonts in PostScript.

item.title: Apache FOP Images update (bug 40676)
item.description:
Images update by GA (fixes bug 40676)
:
Update site documentation about PNG image loading configuration and support. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Images update (bug 40676)
item.description:
Images update by GA (fixes bug 40676)
:
Fix newly introduced findbugs warnings. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Images fix (bug 40676)
item.description:
Images fix by GA (fixes bug 40676)
:
Support use of ImageLoaderRawPNG decoder in order to prevent re-encoding of PNG images (and unnecssary output file bloat). Thanks to Luis Bernardo, Matthias Reischenbacher.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 53412)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 53412)
:
Eliminate incorrect use of object identity which produces excessive property cache collisions. Thanks to Alexios Giotis.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by GA :
Eliminate javadocs warnings.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update (bug 53055)
item.description:
Code update by GA (fixes bug 53055)
:
Update xmlgraphics common jar to reflect recent fixes in XGC.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update (bug 43940)
item.description:
Code update by GA (fixes bug 43940)
:
Fix handling of NaN, {+,-}Infinity, and other edge cases. Submitted by Julien Aymé. Thanks to Julien Aymé.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 53304,53306)
item.description:
Renderers fix by GA (fixes bug 53304,53306)
:
Add version attribute to AT and IF intermediate formats. Also eliminate redundant use of reversed attribute in AT format.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 53295)
item.description:
Renderers fix by GA (fixes bug 53295)
:
Add extension to place code just before PostScript %PageTrailer. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 53294)
item.description:
Renderers fix by GA (fixes bug 53294)
:
Fix invalid PostScript file being created when font-size is 0. Thanks to Robert Meyer.

item.title: Apache FOP Docs update
item.description:
Docs update by GA :
Update FAQ and New Bug documentation.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by VH :
Added support for the role property on fo:page-sequence, fo:flow and fo:static-content. This allows to change the mapping of those FOs to PDF structure types when enabling accessibility.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by VH :
Stop outputting the Type entry for structure elements in order to create a smaller PDF ouptut when accessibility is enabled. Thanks to Martin Koegler.

item.title: Apache FOP Config fix (bug 52144)
item.description:
Config fix by GA (fixes bug 52144)
:
Fix crash on use of version switch (-v). Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 53242)
item.description:
Renderers fix by GA (fixes bug 53242)
:
Support fractional line widths in AFP renderer, fixing problem with SVG line drawing. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Config fix (bug 53248)
item.description:
Config fix by GA (fixes bug 53248)
:
Fix exception thrown from use of -print option in CLI. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Docs fix (bug 53247)
item.description:
Docs fix by GA (fixes bug 53247)
:
Fix renderer mime type for PCL output; should be application/x-pcl.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 40699)
item.description:
Renderers fix by GA (fixes bug 40699)
:
Fix for invalid PDF for certain numerical values in SVG lineargradient. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 53185)
item.description:
Layout fix by GA (fixes bug 53185)
:
Unify date formatting between FOP and XGC as well as tidying the date format code. Thanks to Robert Meyer.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 45715)
item.description:
Layout fix by GA (fixes bug 45715)
:
Fix for break before (break-before) not respected on blocks nested in inlines. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 48723)
item.description:
Renderers fix by GA (fixes bug 48723)
:
Fix for XGC when rendering PostScript using SVG being drawn upside down when using a custom affine transform. Thanks to Robert Meyer.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 43940)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 43940)
:
Use new double format utility to improve thread safety and performance. Thanks to Ognjen Blagojevic.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 53148)
item.description:
Fonts fix by GA (fixes bug 53148)
:
Fix performance regression in JDK 1.6 Update 19 due to use of Java Beans API. Fix checkstyle errors. Thanks to Tassos Charoulis.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 51484)
item.description:
Renderers fix by GA (fixes bug 51484)
:
Don't write final /sect suffix in RTF if section is last section. Thanks to Benjamin Riefenstahl.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 53143)
item.description:
Fonts fix by GA (fixes bug 53143)
:
Ensure fonts are not loaded twice (redundantly).

item.title: Apache FOP Test update (bug 50196)
item.description:
Test update by GA (fixes bug 50196)
:
Add test for basic-link with padding. Thanks to Matthias Reischenbacher.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update
item.description:
Code update by GA :
Improve property function argument parsing, specifically, better separate required, optional, and variable arguments and the handling of optional argument defaults. Regularize property function class names.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 51043)
item.description:
Layout fix by GA (fixes bug 51043)
:
Don't restart layout unless abs(ipd difference) > 1 in order to prevent rounding issues from triggering false restart. Thanks to Pascal Sancho.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts update
item.description:
Fonts update by GA :
Removing experimental feature that violates XSL-FO and Unicode semantics by misinterpreting Basic Latin code points. Users must use private use codepoints to access font specific character mappings that have no assigned Unicode code point. See bug 50492.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 53103)
item.description:
Layout fix by GA (fixes bug 53103)
:
Ensure that table cell spanning works in right-to-left writing mode. Thanks to Matthias Reischenbacher.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 53086)
item.description:
Layout fix by GA (fixes bug 53086)
:
Ensure that table footer and header are included in bididirectional resolution.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 53097)
item.description:
Layout fix by GA (fixes bug 53097)
:
Ensure writing-mode specified on fo:table is used to determine writing mode of table and its descendants.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 53094)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 53094)
:
Convert block container overflow exception to event model, improving overflow property behavior. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Code update (bug 51617)
item.description:
Code update by GA (fixes bug 51617)
:
Add run target for embedded examples. Add increased JVM memory heap flag for example8 in case font cache is rebuilt.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 53083)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 53083)
:
Update to use of checkstyle-5.5 as default configuration. Remove checkstyle-4.0 configuration. Also, import environment build properties before local properties, so that latter can refer to former.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 52572)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 52572)
:
Prevent NPE on use of unsupported collapse-with-precedence; fall back to collapse. Fix checkstyle errors from prior commit. Thanks to Pascal Sancho.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 52514)
item.description:
Layout fix by GA (fixes bug 52514)
:
Ensure square image is appropriately scaled. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 50062)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 50062)
:
Invoke JVM in headless mode from FOP command scripts and JS shell to prevent stealing focus from GUI applications.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 52114)
item.description:
Renderers fix by GA (fixes bug 52114)
:
Take leading derived space before/after into account when computing rows for TXT renderer.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 49893)
item.description:
Code add by PH (fixes bug 49893)
:
A global setting to wrap F11 images in page segments.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 52763)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 52763)
:
Support list-block in marker, thus preventing NPE.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by GA :
Must use unqualified (local name) when reporting invalid child error.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 53065)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 53065)
:
Restore lookup on Event message lookup field part. Add locale field to Event to enable locale dependent deferred bundle load during lookup field part substitution.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by MH :
Bug in AFP font metrics that performed integer arithmetic when it should have been double arithemetic.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 49754)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 49754)
:
Bring clone() in line with the recommendations in Object.clone(). Thanks to Simon Pepping.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 52966)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 52966)
:
How to use native text with EPSDocumentGraphics2D. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 51599)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 51599)
:
Allow https scheme URI for PDF external action target. Thanks to Paul Huemer.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 50901)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 50901)
:
RTF percentage table column width not calculated from table. Thanks to Carsten Pfeiffer.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 51009)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 51009)
:
RTF generates unexpected lines for blocks in tables. Also fix three findbugs issues. Thanks to Max Aster.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 51007)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 51007)
:
RTF tables do not support percent column-widths. Thanks to Max Aster.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 50435)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 50435)
:
Access denied (java.util.PropertyPermission org.apache.fop.fo.properties.use-cache read). Thanks to Armin Haaf.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 49763)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 49763)
:
Incorrect message when encountering a block in an inline in a footnote. Thanks to Adrian Buza.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 47380)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 47380)
:
Specified rule-thickness applies only when leader-pattern is rule, otherwise should use default thickness. Thanks to Georg Datterl.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 49302)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 49302)
:
Eliminate duplicate code. Thanks to Julien Aymé.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 49350)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 49350)
:
Correct coding error in AFPResourceLevel#equals. Thanks to Julien Aymé.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 51836)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 51836)
:
Throw IFException instead of NPE if navigation target (page reference) doesn't exist. Thanks to Melanie Drake.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 51808)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 51808)
:
Fixed memory waste in traits map. Thanks to Sergey Vladimirov.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 51807)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 51807)
:
Fixed small memory waste in rowCells array construction. Thanks to Sergey Vladimirov.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 53005)
item.description:
Code fix by GA (fixes bug 53005)
:
Fixed incorrect rejection of fo:wrapper inside fo:inline inside fo:footnote-body. Thanks to Alberto Simões.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by VH :
Added support for PDF Object Streams. When accessibility is enabled and PDF version 1.5 selected, the structure tree will be stored in object streams in order to reduce the size of the final PDF. Thanks to Peter Hancock.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 46962)
item.description:
Code fix by VH (fixes bug 46962)
:
Fixed deadlock in PropertyCache. Thanks to Alexios Giotis.

item.title: Apache FOP Config add (bug 51385)
item.description:
Config add by VH (fixes bug 51385)
:
Added configuration option to set the version of the output PDF document. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 52849)
item.description:
Code fix by MH (fixes bug 52849)
:
Fixed bug that caused a configured and installed SVG font to be stroked, also added an event indicating when fonts are stroked. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by PH :
Fix of a bug introduced when merging ImproveAccessibility.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 50391)
item.description:
Code add by PH (fixes bug 50391)
:
Improved support for empty flow-name mapping.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout add (bug 32789, 49008, 49687)
item.description:
Layout add by GA (fixes bug 32789, 49008, 49687)
:
Add support for complex scripts, including: full bidi support, support for advanced typographic tables, advanced support for number conversion.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts add
item.description:
Fonts add by GA :
Add support for OpenType advanced typographic tables (GDEF, GSUB, GPOS).

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 52655)
item.description:
Code fix by VH (fixes bug 52655)
:
Fixed rendering of special glyphs when using single-byte encoding mode. Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add
item.description:
Code add by PH :
Improvements of the Accessibility features. Thanks to Vincent Hennebert.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 52416)
item.description:
Code add by CB (fixes bug 52416)
:
Suppress unnecessary "font not found warnings" when generating AFP with raster fonts Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 51209)
item.description:
Code add by CB (fixes bug 51209)
:
SVG text in AFP creates miscoded GOCA text Thanks to Luis Bernardo.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 50391)
item.description:
Code add by CB (fixes bug 50391)
:
Add support for different flow-name of fo:region-body in FOP Thanks to Peter Hancock.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 51664)
item.description:
Code add by CB (fixes bug 51664)
:
Tagged PDF performance improvement plus tests Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 52197)
item.description:
Code add by MH (fixes bug 52197)
:
Improved AdobeStandardEncoding support in AFM files for type1 fonts

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 52151)
item.description:
Code add by VH (fixes bug 52151)
:
Added ant script to get JaCoCo code coverage. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 52136)
item.description:
Code add by VH (fixes bug 52136)
:
Added to build file JUnit target that uses a regex to run all of the test cases. This reduces the risk that some of them are omitted when building FOP. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 52089)
item.description:
Code add by PH (fixes bug 52089)
:
Allow JPEG images to be embedded in an AFP document as is, without being decoded and encoded. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 52010)
item.description:
Code add by PH (fixes bug 52010)
:
Simplification of the build: Reduced code duplication and layout engine tests. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
Various bugfixes to make PDFDocumentGraphics2D operational again.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 51962)
item.description:
Code add by PH (fixes bug 51962)
:
Fix for when the last simple-page-master referenced in a page-sequence-master is not chosen when force-page-count=odd. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 51928)
item.description:
Code add by VH (fixes bug 51928)
:
Upgraded all tests to JUnit 4. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 48696)
item.description:
Fonts fix by PH (fixes bug 48696)
:
Bugfix for color model in IOCA IDE structure parameter for 4- and 8-bit grayscale images. Revision 4.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 51760)
item.description:
Fonts fix by PH (fixes bug 51760)
:
Changes the way PostScript handles Graphics2D images such that if the language is set to level 3, the image is stored as an embedded file which has no length limit. Previously it was stored as an array which has a implementation limit of 65535 elements. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 51759)
item.description:
Fonts fix by PH (fixes bug 51759)
:
PDFFactory responsible for asdigning name to a subset font. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 51530)
item.description:
Fonts fix by PH (fixes bug 51530)
:
Improved support for EBCDIC encoded double byte fonts fo AFP. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 51205)
item.description:
Fonts fix by PH (fixes bug 51205)
:
Corrected typographical errors in AFPBase12FontCollection. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 48062)
item.description:
Renderers fix by PH (fixes bug 48062)
:
Improved fix of a bug relating to PCL painter thread safetly. Previous fix in rev 895012 worked by synchronizing methods of a static instance of Java2DFontMetrics. This fix uses a unique instance for per thread.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by PH :
Fixed a bug in AFP where an ArrayOutofBoundsException is throwqn when embedding a Page Segment.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by VH :
Added support for 128bit encryption in PDF output. Thanks to Michael Rubin.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by PH :
Fixed a bug in AFP where the object area axes of an Include Object was incorrectly set when rotated by 180.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 51596)
item.description:
Fonts fix by JM (fixes bug 51596)
:
Fixed a bug in TTF subsetting where a composite glyph could get remapped more than once resulting in garbled character. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 50605)
item.description:
Fonts fix by JM (fixes bug 50605)
:
Fixed a number of bugs concerning Type 1 and other single-byte fonts (glyph width mismatches and overlapping characters).

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
Fixed a multi-threading bug for SVG images included through svg:image inside SVG documents.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by PH :
Added an IFDocumentHandler filter for triggering rendering events. Created an Event that captures an end page event with the page number.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by VH :
Fix for alternative text not working in tagged PDF for TIFF images.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 50909)
item.description:
Renderers fix by PH (fixes bug 50909)
:
Fixed io exception in MODCAParser caused by the improper use of mark() and reset() on the MODCA data input stream. Added unit test.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix (bug 51144)
item.description:
Fonts fix by JM (fixes bug 51144)
:
Removed invalid entries in ToUnicode table of CID subset fonts. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 50899)
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM (fixes bug 50899)
:
Fixed mapping of font weights between CSS values and TextAttribute.WEIGHT_*. Thanks to Glenn Adams.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
AFP GOCA: fonts were not embedded from within AFPGraphics2D.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
AFP GOCA: Changed the way FOP fonts are selected based on Batik's GVT fonts to match the behaviour of PDF/PS output.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
Added option to place AFP NOPs right before the end of a named page group (page-sequence), rather than after the start.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
Added option for PostScript output to optimize for file size rather than quality.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
AFP GOCA: Added option to disable GOCA and to control text painting inside GOCA graphics.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
AFP GOCA: Work-around for InfoPrint's AFP implementation which seems to lose the character set state over Graphics Data (GAD) boundaries.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
Bugfix for AFP GOCA segments: they were not properly marked as appended which could lead to graphics state changes in some implementations.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 51010)
item.description:
Renderers fix by CB (fixes bug 51010)
:
Bugzilla 51010: Bookmarks create useless lines in RTF Thanks to Max Aster.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 51008)
item.description:
Renderers fix by CB (fixes bug 51008)
:
Bugzilla 51008: page-number-citation-last does not work in RTF Thanks to Max Aster.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by VH :
Added id element to intermediate format to track the origin of content.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 50987)
item.description:
Renderers fix by AD (fixes bug 50987)
:
Bugzilla 50988: Fixed a NullPointerException in case a white-space fo:character was removed due to white-space handling. Thanks to Matthias Reischenbacher.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 50987)
item.description:
Renderers fix by AD (fixes bug 50987)
:
Bugzilla 50987: Fixed an issue in PDF output where a link was added to the parent tree instead of the related structure element. Thanks to Martin Koegler.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 50986)
item.description:
Renderers fix by AD (fixes bug 50986)
:
Bugzilla 50986: Fixed an issue where invalid PDF page content was generated due to incorrect ET/EMC sequences. Thanks to Martin Koegler.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 50593)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 50593)
:
Fixed regression introduced by Bugzilla 50593: bookmarks pointing to a non-existing internal destination should just trigger a warning.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 50965)
item.description:
Layout fix by AD (fixes bug 50965)
:
Bugzilla 50965: Fixed a regression in BlockContainerLayoutManager where margins were no longer reset after forced breaks. Thanks to Martin Koegler.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix
item.description:
Layout fix by VH :
Implemented non-standard behavior for basic-link areas, such that they take into account the heights of their descendants areas.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix
item.description:
Layout fix by VH :
Fix for keep-together does not apply to fo:table-cell.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix
item.description:
Layout fix by VH :
Fix for keep-together on a table containing row-spanning cells that was not honored.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 50196)
item.description:
Layout fix by VH (fixes bug 50196)
:
Fix forpadding-start ignored when table-header/footer is repeated. Thanks to Matthias Reischenbacher.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM :
Increased maximum possible PDF size from 2GB to around 9GB (hard maximum imposed by the PDF specification).

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
Added support for CIE Lab colors (from XSL-FO 2.0 WD).

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 49403)
item.description:
Renderers add by JM (fixes bug 49403)
:
Initial work on spot colors (aka named colors) for PDF output. Thanks to Patrick Jaromin.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 50705)
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM (fixes bug 50705)
:
Fix to preserve the order of AFP TLEs and NOPs as given in the XSL-FO document. Thanks to Mehdi Houshmand.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts add (bug 50699)
item.description:
Fonts add by JM (fixes bug 50699)
:
Added support for lookup of alternative glyphs when additional single-byte encodings are used, ex. replacing "Omegagreek" by "Omega" and vice versa. Thanks to Alexandros Papadakis.

item.title: Apache FOP Code add (bug 48334)
item.description:
Code add by AD (fixes bug 48334)
:
Added support for resolution of relative URIs against a specified xml:base during property refinement.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add
item.description:
Renderers add by JM :
Allow afp:no-operation to also appear under fo:page-sequence and fo:declarations.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 50635)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 50635)
:
Fix for issue in RenderPagesModel.checkPreparedPages() where the same page-sequence is potentially started multiple times. Thanks to Martin Koegler.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 50636)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 50636)
:
Fix for performance issue when adding pages, if the total number of pages is significantly large. Thanks to Martin Koegler.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 50626)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 50626)
:
Fix for performance issue when adding nodes, if the number of children is significantly large. Thanks to Martin Koegler.

item.title: Apache FOP Config fix
item.description:
Config fix by SP :
Fix for relative URIs in the configuration file (base, font-base, hyphenation-base) are evaluated relative to the base URI of the configuration file.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 49848)
item.description:
Layout fix by AD (fixes bug 49848)
:
Fix for correct behavior of keep-together.within-line in case there are nested inlines

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 50471)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 50471)
:
Fix for avoid ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException for codepoints without a linebreak class

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 48380)
item.description:
Layout fix by AD (fixes bug 48380)
:
Fix for avoid ClassCastException when using fox:widow-content-limit

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 50089)
item.description:
Layout fix by VH (fixes bug 50089)
:
Fix for content after forced break in block-container is not rendered.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 42034)
item.description:
Layout fix by JM (fixes bug 42034)
:
Fixed adjustment of inline parent area for justified text containing a forward page reference.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 38264)
item.description:
Layout fix by AD (fixes bug 38264)
:
Fixed behavior when combining hyphenation with preserved linefeeds or whitespace.

item.title: Apache FOP Code fix (bug 49695)
item.description:
Code fix by VH (fixes bug 49695)
:
Replaced magic numbers with constants from UnitConv and GraphicsConstants. Thanks to Joshua Marquart.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 42600)
item.description:
Renderers add by JM (fixes bug 42600)
:
Added some support for break-before/-after for RTF output. Thanks to Max Aster.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 49379)
item.description:
Renderers add by JM (fixes bug 49379)
:
Added ability to embed an external AFP page segment resource file (AFP output only). Thanks to Peter Hancock.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers fix (bug 46360)
item.description:
Renderers fix by JM (fixes bug 46360)
:
Fixed a multi-threading issue when rendering SVG. Thanks to Alexios Giotis.

item.title: Apache FOP Layout fix (bug 49885)
item.description:
Layout fix by JM (fixes bug 49885)
:
Fixed retrieval of available BPD for cases spanning columns and multiple pages with differing page masters.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers remove
item.description:
Renderers remove by VH :
Removed old Renderer implementations for those output formats that have a version based on the new DocumentHandler architecture available (AFP, PCL, PDF, PS).

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts fix
item.description:
Fonts fix by AC :
Reinstated support for being able to specify a font cache filepath in the fop user configuration.

item.title: Apache FOP Fonts add
item.description:
Fonts add by AC :
Added convenience support for the flushing of the Fop font cache file from the command line.

item.title: Apache FOP Renderers add (bug 44460)
item.description:
Renderers add by JM (fixes bug 44460)
:
Added support for PDF File Attachments (Embedded Files). Thanks to Andrejus Chaliapinas.
